title: Array Element Replacement
description: Write a program that takes an array of integers and replaces all occurrences of a specific element with a new value. The program should ask the user for the array size, the array elements, the element to be replaced, and the new value.
sample_input:
Enter array size: 5
Enter array elements: 1 2 3 2 4
Enter element to replace: 2
Enter new value: 10
